      Method to assign armies to the countries so that each country will get at least one army as per the conquest game rule.

      Method to assign the number of armies to the players which differs based on the players count.

      Method to assign countries to the players.

      This method is called when the player choses to opt for all out attack mode.

      This method is used to assign armies to the Countries.

      This method assigns cards to the country in the game
      void PlayerController.attackPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Country attacker, Country defender)
      This method marks the starting of the attack phase when the player choses to attack a country.
      void PlayerController.gamePlay(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
      This method starts the game, obtaining the number of payers , details and initializing them.
      Country PlayerController.getAdjacentCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph, java.lang.String attackerAdjCountry)
      This method gets the adjacent country object for the entered country
      Player PlayerController.getCurrentPlayer(GameMapGraph mapGraph, java.lang.String playerName)
      This method returns the current player

      This method gets the player based on the entered country.

      This method returns the player who owns the given country
      boolean PlayerController.isPlaceArmiesComplete(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
      This method is to check the completion of placing an army
      boolean DiceController.moveArmies(int armiesToBeMoved, Country attackerCountry, Country defenderCountry, GameMapGraph gameMapGraph)
      This method is called when after a win by the attacker it moves armies to the country it has won.
      int PlayerController.reinforcementPhase(Player player, GameMapGraph mapGraph)
      This method assigns the number of armies to the player when certain conditions are met.
      void LoadMapController.saveMap(GameMapGraph mapgraph, java.lang.String oldFileName)
      This method aims to save the map which was edited post loading into the game.
